Key Match Events: Andrew Wiggins scored a game-high 29 points
Buddy Hield hit a baseline jumper and a 4-point play
Kevon Looney recorded a double-double off the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stephen Curry hurt his left ankle late in the third quarter and re-injured it early in the fourth quarter, forcing him to be sidelined for the remainder of the game
Others: The Warriors lost to the Los Angeles Clippers 112-104
The Clippers had a 20-point advantage in paint points (58-38)
